Question: "Scream" was a duet, performed with this person's youngest sister Janet.
Hints: This person lost weight in the early 1980s because of a change in diet and a desire for "a dancer's body".
On June 25, 2010, the first anniversary of this person's death, fans traveled to Los Angeles to pay their tribute to him.
At the time of death, this person had been administered propofol, lorazepam and midazolam.
